column5: Designed for those interested in developing themselves in a healthcare education role, the programme offers flexible learning to suit students who are working while they study. Cultivate your teaching practice to instil principles and values of interprofessional education and support the development of the future and current healthcare work force.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year part time (PgCert), 2 years part time (PgDip), 3 years part time (MSc)
